SEARCH
Package org.opencastproject.util.doc.rest

Class ExtendedMediaType

java.lang.Object
javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType
org.opencastproject.util.doc.rest.ExtendedMediaType
public class ExtendedMediaType extends javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType
This class extends the javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType. Media types that are returned by our rest endpoints but not present in MediaType is included here.
